author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

#40725 deletes an existing Service in `ProcessAccelerator.apply()`, which was noticed in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/8301#issuecomment-1424072445 to not work, because the `Process` is wrapped into `ProcessForProcessAccelerator` when passed to `ProcessAccelerator.apply()`, and the `ProcessForProcessAccelerator` did not implement `__delattr__()`. This PR implements the `__dellattr__()`.

#### PR validation:

Added unit test succeeds. A simple test configuration reproducing the behavior in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/8301#issuecomment-1424072445 succeeds.
title: Allow ProcessAccelerators to delete Services
